slides.script: I forgot my email password 3 times in one day. My brain felt like it was in a fog. Sound familiar?
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a frustrated man staring at a computer screen, rubbing his forehead, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I used to be so sharp, but lately I've been struggling to focus at work, losing my train of thought mid-sentence, and feeling exhausted by 2pm. I chalked it up to getting older, but deep down, I knew something wasn't right.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a tired-looking woman rubbing her eyes at an office desk, papers scattered everywhere, clock showing 2:15pm, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: What doctors don't tell you is that chronic brain fog and low energy can be early warning signs of serious cognitive decline. While I was struggling to get through each day, I had no idea my brain health was at risk.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic close-up of a doctor's face with a concerned expression, bright lighting from medical exam room, stethoscope around neck, 16k, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Then one day, my sister, a neuroscientist, told me about a breakthrough brain-boosting nutrient blend that was getting amazing results in clinical trials. She said it was like a "wake-up call" for sluggish brain cells.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of two women, one in a lab coat, having an intense conversation in a bright, modern laboratory setting, microscopes and scientific equipment in background, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: The key nutrients had been shown to improve focus, mental clarity and overall brain function in double-blind, placebo-controlled studies. Top neurologists were already recommending it to patients. I knew I had to try it.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a medical journal article with graphs showing improved brain function, a hand pointing to key results, 16k, bright lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Day 3: I noticed I wasn't losing my keys as often. Day 7: I could power through my whole workday without that afternoon slump. Week 2: My mental clarity and focus were better than they'd been in years.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a smiling man looking energized and holding up a set of keys in front of a neat, organized desk, calendar on wall showing 2 week progress, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Even my husband was shocked. He said "You're like a new person. What's your secret?" My mom started taking it too, and now she's sharper than ever at 70. She tells everyone it's her "cognition supercharger.

slides.script: Now, I'm breezing through my to-do lists, I have all-day energy and focus, and I feel mentally sharper than I have in decades. It's not just a boost - it's whole-brain rejuvenation.

slides.script: The brain boosting breakthrough? VitalLife Energy Boost Gummies. Powered by a patented, medical-grade nutrient blend, in easy-to-take gummies for all-day brain support. This is the real deal.
